Question: Luxonis CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Luxonis

Stereo Depth

 - High-resolution cameras
 - Depth vision
 - 200 fps
 - 1 million points
 - Range up to 25 meters

Computer Vision

 - Real-time on-chip processing
 - Feature tracking
 - Edge detection

Artificial Intelligence

 - On-chip machine learning capabilities
